description: My new start-up. The Web Design, Wireframes, Logos etc. designed by yours truly. This is my baby and I can't wait to see it grow.

My first client as a freelance Web Designer and Internet Marketer. My Internet Marketing services have 'greatly increased the infrastructure of the company over the past year' - James Vucinovich, President of RVPC.

Eric is a renowned DUI and Criminal Defense Attorney in Northern Colorado. He came to me because he understood that as the world becomes more techonologically driven so will the marketing tactics of law firms.
A quick one page website I created for Healing Way Ministry, a small church located in Greeley, CO.
